name: Petal Vogue
description: A fast fashion e-commerce platform where each product has a unique page with specific coloring and sizing. Key features include a sorting system, search functionality, wishlist management, and a user-friendly cart system. Product details can be edited directly from the wishlist or cart. The platform also features a recommendation system that suggests products based on user preferences. It is fully responsive and maintains data between refreshes using local storage.

name: Weather App
description: A weather app providing a 24-hour and 3-day forecast using a free weather API. Key features include current weather conditions, zipcode search functionality, and real-time updates. The app offers a user-friendly interface with detailed weather information, ensuring users stay informed about upcoming weather changes.

name: Calculator
description: A simple calculator for performing mathematical calculations. Key features include clear functionality, changing negative to positive, percentage calculations, and basic arithmetic operations.

name: Etch A Sketch
description: A virtual Etch A Sketch simulating the classic experience on a web page. Key features include changing grid size, drawing, erasing, and clearing the screen.

name: Image slider
description: A simple image slider for displaying a series of images with animation and transition effects. Key features include image shifting following the cursor, hover effects, and smooth transitions.
